Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.constraints

Class VisibilityConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.constraints.Constraint
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.constraints.VisibilityConstraint
  • public class VisibilityConstraint
extends Constraint
    A VisibilityConstraint requires that a cell be visible from another. More specifically, the drain must be visible from the source.
    See Also:
    Cell.canSee(Cell)

    • Field Detail

      • truth

        private boolean truth

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisibilityConstraint

        VisibilityConstraint​(int sourceAttackModuleId,
                     int sourceTargetId,
                     int drainAttackModuleId,
                     int drainTargetId,
                     boolean truth)
        This is the only constructor.
        Parameters:
        sourceAttackModuleId - the id of the AttackModule containing the source Target.
        sourceTargetId - the id of the source Target.
        drainAttackModuleId - the id of the AttackModule containing the drain Target.
        drainTargetId - the id of the drain Target.
        truth - the truth value needed from the visibility predicate, in order to satisfy the Constraint.

    • Method Detail

      • verify

        private boolean verify​(Cell sourceCell,
                       Cell drainCell)
        Tells if the Constraint is satisfied by two given cells.
        Parameters:
        sourceCell - the source cell.
        drainCell - the drain cell.
        Returns:
        true if the cells satisfy the Constraint, false if they don't or if any of them is null.

      • verify

        private boolean verify​(Cell sourceCell,
                       Room drainRoom)
        Tells if the Constraint is satisfied by a cell and any other cell found inside a Room.
        Parameters:
        sourceCell - the cell.
        drainRoom - the Room.
        Returns:
        true if and only if the cell satisfies the Constraint as the source, with any of the cells inside the Room acting as the drain.
